arStrings.szText: {c_important}Ball Lightning{/c} orbits around you and deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage. You may have up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} {c_important}Ball Lightnings{/c} and casting more increases the damage of the existing ones by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"*100|%|]{/c} each.
